thread.section_title: Hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Hotel -
thread.title_full: Lovely Hotel - Review of Hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ricky R
title: Lovely Hotel -
text:
We stayed here for three nights in February whilst exploring Paris and visiting Disneyland.
The hotel is perfect if you want cheap, cheerful and modern. The location is perfect, couldn't have found better if we tried. The staff were friendly and helpful.
Our Eurostar wasn't until 7.30pm on the day we checked out and they allowed us to leave our bags safely in their storage cupboard and allowed us to use their facilities to get changed when we returned to collect our suitcases.
The only downfall, if anything is that they only provide coffee in the room... no tea and no milk?
We wouldn't hesitate to return again if we decided to explore Paris again!
